statements.name: PROC MDSUMMARY
statements.description: Calculates multidimensional summaries of numeric variables.

arguments.name: DATA=
arguments.description: specifies the two-level input table name.

arguments.name: NTHREADS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of threads to use within each compute node.

statements.name: VAR
statements.description: Specifies the analysis variables and their order in the output.

arguments.name: variable
arguments.description: identifies one or more analysis variables and specifies their order in the results.

statements.name: GROUPBY
statements.description: Creates BY groups in terms of the variable value combinations given the variables in the variable list.

arguments.name: variable
arguments.description: specifies the analysis variables to group by.

statements.name: OUTPUT
statements.description: Creates an output table that contains the results of PROC MDSUMMARY.
